babel-autocreate-text-levels: Dwumadzifo a wɔwɔ dɛm kuw kyerɛ dɛ wɔwɔ nyimdzii $1 ma kasa $2.
babel-autocreate-text-main: Dwumadzifo a wɔwɔ dɛm kuw yi mu kyerɛ hɔn kasa $1 ho nyimdzee.
babel-1: Dɛm dwumadzinyi yi wɔ [[$1|ahyɛase]] ho nyimdz wɔ [[$2|$3]].
babel-3: Dɛm dwumadzinyi yi wɔ nyimdzee a [[$1|ɔkɔ nkan]] wɔ [[$2|$3]].
babel-4: Dɛm dwumadzinyi wɔ [[$1|kasa no ho]] nyimdzee [[$2|$3]].
babel-5: Dɛm dwumadzinyi yi wɔ nyimdzee [[$1|mapa]] wɔ [[$2|$3]].
babel-N: Dɛm dwumadzinyi yi wɔ [[$1|kurowmanyi]] ntseasee wɔ [[$2|$3]].
babel-0-n: Dɛm dwumadzinyi yi [[$1|nnyi]] [[$2|Mfantse]] ho nyimdzee (anaa ne ntseasee yɛ no dzen).
babel-1-n: Dɔm dwumadzinyi yi wɔ [[$1|ahyɛase]] nyimdzee wɔ [[$2|Mfantse]].
babel-2-n: Dɛm dwumadzinyi yi wɔ [[$1|egyinantamu]] nyimdzee wɔ [[$2|Mfantse]].
babel-3-n: Dɛm dwumadzinyi yi wɔ [[$1|kankɔ]] nyimdzee wɔ [[$2|Mfantse]].
babel-4-n: Dɛm dwumadzinyi yi wɔ [[$1|kurowmanyi nyimdzee]] wɔ [[$2|Mfantse]].
babel-5-n: Dɛm dwumadzinyi yi wɔ [[$1|nyimdzee mapa]] wɔ [[$2|Mfantse]].
babel-N-n: Dɛm dwumadzinyi yi wɔ [[$1|kurowmanyi]] ntseasee wɔ [[$2|Mfantse]].
